name: Fort Pitt Bridge Works, Appellant, v. Malabar Construction, Inc. et al., Appellants
name_abbreviation: Fort Pitt Bridge Works v. Malabar Construction, Inc.

judges: Before Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Fort Pitt Bridge Works, Appellant, v. Malabar Construction, Inc. et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Order affirmed. Appellants to pay costs.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: David McNeil Olds, with him William M. Robinson, William, T. Marsh, and Reed, Smith, Shaw & McOlay, for plaintiff.
John A. Metz, Jr., with him A. L. Balter, David Lubart, and Rubin & Balter, and Metz, Cook, Hanna é Kelly, for defendants.
casebody.head_matter:
Fort Pitt Bridge Works, Appellant, v. Malabar Construction, Inc. et al., Appellants.
Argued April 29, 1969.
Before Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
David McNeil Olds, with him William M. Robinson, William, T. Marsh, and Reed, Smith, Shaw & McOlay, for plaintiff.
John A. Metz, Jr., with him A. L. Balter, David Lubart, and Rubin & Balter, and Metz, Cook, Hanna é Kelly, for defendants.
November 28, 1969:
